content.value: Buy any 3 activewear, downwear, cashmere or socks items save $5, buy any 4 and save $10

A timeless staple. Our men's cashmere turtleneck sweater features 100% Grade A Mongolian cashmere. A versatile classic, it can easily be worn when you need to look your best, or worn casually with a pair of jeans. It'll soon become a part of your everyday uniform.
Material: Rare 100% Pure Grade A Mongolian cashmere; 15.1 micron thickness, 35 mm super long fiber length.
Read our Cashmere 101 to learn more about cashmere, its origin, and how to care for it
Origin: Cashmere sourced from Hircus Goats in Inner Mongolia
Model is 6'0" and wearing the cashmere turtleneck in a size M

Hand wash using cold water and neutral soap or baby shampoo. Rinse out without rubbing and lay flat to dry at room temperature, avoiding sunlight. Iron at low temperature, using pressing cloth. Do not bleach. If you prefer to dry clean, please ask for delicate detergent.

productDetails.productDetails:
• Material: Rare 100% Pure Grade A Mongolian cashmere; 15.1 micron thickness, 35 mm super long fiber length.
  • Construction: 12-gauge, 2-ply knit
  • Read our Cashmere 101 to learn more about cashmere, its origin, and how to care for it
  • Origin: Cashmere sourced from Hircus Goats in Inner Mongolia
  • Model is 6'0" and wearing the cashmere turtleneck in a size M

productDescription.productDescription: A timeless staple. Our men's cashmere turtleneck sweater features 100% Grade A Mongolian cashmere. A versatile classic, it can easily be worn when you need to look your best, or worn casually with a pair of jeans. It'll soon become a part of your everyday uniform.

A versatile classic, this crewneck sweater can easily be worn when you need to look your best, and worn casually with a pair of jeans or around the house. It'll soon become a part of your everyday uniform.

productDescription.productDescription: The classic pullover for cozy, laidback days. The heavyweight 375g cotton fleece feels plush and luxurious, and the interior kangaroo phone pocket keeps essentials secure when you're on the move. Made from 100% organic cotton.

productDescription.productDescription: A timeless staple. Our cashmere sweaters feature 100% Grade A Mongolian cashmere. A versatile classic, this crewneck sweater can easily be worn when you need to look your best, and worn casually with a pair of jeans or around the house. It'll soon become a part of your everyday uniform.

content.value: We partner with factories who have a commitment to responsible production. This means paying workers fairly and doing their best to produce in a way that reduces damage to the environment.

We're working hard to use sustainably produced materials that minimize our impact on the planet, such as organic cotton, responsibly sourced wool, and finishes that are free of harmful chemicals and toxins.
We believe in creating high quality, functional, and timeless essentials that will be used or worn for a long time, and won't end up in a landfill.

Thanks for your review.
Your comment will soon be 
visible online.

reviews.body: This sweater is my favorite now!

content.value: "Quince’s new rug collection is hand knotted and tufted by artisans in India. Best of all, the prices are fairly reasonable for the top-notch quality you’re getting."
"We've got you covered with this very affordable cashmere sweater that somehow clocks in at a miraculous 50 buckeroos."
"New Online Fashion Brand Aims To Get Eco-Friendly Clothes From Factory-To-Closet At Affordable Prices."
"While D2C brands have changed the way we shop,
is looking to change retail even more dramatically."
"A cashmere crewneck for $50?! It’s now a reality — in 10 colors — thanks to Quince."
"The brand connects with factories to sell direct to the customer, promising consumers better prices and factories with better margins."
"The Quince Organic Percale Luxe Sheet Set collection is an excellent choice for anyone who sleeps hot at night."
"You can get a cashmere sweater for only $50 from this radically transparent basics company."
"My next plane outfit when I can travel again."
"These Luxurious Linen Sheets Make Me Feel Like I’m Sleeping in a Fancy Hotel"
